statements: DELETE FROM PerformanceLogs WHERE log_id = 100 AND user_id = 10
DELETE FROM PerformanceLogs WHERE timestamp < '2021-01-01' AND duration > 1000
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE username = 'john.doe' AND activity_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM system_usage WHERE cpu_usage > 80 AND memory_usage < 50;
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 101 AND activity_type = 'Login';
DELETE FROM error_logs WHERE log_id = 500 AND error_time < '2022-01-01';
